metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29978 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is a floating point exception error in sixel_encoder_do_resize, encoder.c:633 in libsixel img2sixel 1.8.6. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted JPEG file.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
